RemoveFromReportListThread - Class in eu.opends.trigger
This class represents a thread which will cause the removal of a given trigger from the simulators's trigger report list after a given amount of time has passed by.

removeTriggerReport(String) - Static method in class eu.opends.trigger.TriggerCenter
Every time a trigger is reported it will be added to trigger report list in order to avoid multiple instances of the event (e.g. if car still hits the trigger after 10 milliseconds).
